articles.content: Samsung silently launched its latest Galaxy A-series members with the Galaxy A05 and Galaxy A05s. Both new phones feature 6.7-inch LCDs with HD+ resolution on the A05 and FHD+ resolution on the A05s.… [+890 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk wants to buy an iPhone 15 and internet finds his reason quite relatable - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Elon Musk wants to buy an iPhone 15 and the reason behind his decision was deemed as relatable by social media users. Musk was responding to a post by Apple CEO Tim Cook.
